def_en: A sacrament is a Christian religious ceremony such as communion, baptism, or marriage.

def_cn: (天主教)圣餐面包;(英国国教会)圣饼和葡萄酒
def_en: In the Roman Catholic church, the Sacrament is the holy bread eaten at the Eucharist. In the Anglican church, the Sacrament is the holy bread and wine taken at Holy Communion.
